channel.title: Love tabletop games? D&D? Come play Spycraft with us!
channel.description: A few of us over in the #rp channel on IRC are trying to get a campaign started using the Spycraft 2.0 rule set. If you're interested, slide on in and give me a ping. We're waiting on a couple more people to commit before starting the campaign. See you there!

item.title: Love tabletop games? D&D? Come play Spycraft with us!
item.dc:creator: fraq
item.description:
Nope. We need 3 + a DM, so we’re missing one player.

Read full topic
item.source: Love tabletop games? D&D? Come play Spycraft with us!
